title: Researchers Say Beavers Are More Than Simple Pests
teaser: Most people think of beavers as pests â€” they cause floods and block irrigation. But as Mel Babik tells NPR's Scott Simon, she's finding a new use for the buck-toothed critters in the Yakima Basin.
